about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Kabra Jewels Limited is engaged in the retail jewelry business, offers a diverse collection of gold, diamond, and silver ornaments.

The company designs, manufactures, and sells a wide range of gold, studded, and other jewelry products across various price, ranging from jewelry for special occasions, such as weddings, which is their highest-selling product category, to daily-wear jewelry.

The company operates 6 showrooms in Ahmedabad under the brands KK Jewels Bridal, KK Jewels Diamond, KK Jewels Silver, KK Jewels Gold, KK Jewels - Atarashi, and KK Jewels - Silver Studio, along with 3 offices and 1 exhibition center.

Business Model:

  • Model 1: Where the company procures goods directly from vendors (General Designs) like Chains, Rings, Pendants, Earrings.
  • Model 2: Where the company customizes jewelry based on their in-house specialized designs or customer orders. They select vendors or karigars based on their expertise for the jewelry to be manufactured like Necklace, Mang tikka, earrings, Bracelet.

Products: Rings, Earrings, Pendants, Nose, Bracelets, Chains, Necklaces and Bangles.

As on November 30, 2024, the company has employed 121 employees.

Competitve Strength:

  • Established brand
  • Quality of the products
  • Experienced promoters with established track record of operations
  • Well established relationship with the artisans
  • Design and Innovation in the product range
  • Experienced management team and a motivated & efficient work force.

anchorInvestors.summary: Kabra Jewels IPO raises Rs 10.87 crore from anchor investors. Kabra Jewels IPO Anchor bid date is January 14 2025. Kabra Jewels IPO Anchor Investors list

faqs.question: What is the Kabra Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kabra Jewels IPO is a SME IPO of 3125000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹40.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹128 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on January 15, 2025, and closes on January 17, 2025.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kabra Jewels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kabra Jewels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kabra Jewels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kabra Jewels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kabra Jewels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kabra Jewels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kabra Jewels IPO opens on January 15, 2025 and closes on January 17, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kabra Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: Kabra Jewels IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kabra Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kabra Jewels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kabra Jewels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kabra Jewels IPO will be done on Monday, January 20, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, January 21, 2025. Check the Kabra Jewels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kabra Jewels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kabra Jewels IPO listing date is on Wednesday, January 22, 2025.
